 
{{Client function}}
This function is used to return the playback length of the specified [[/sound.md|sound]] element.
{{New feature/item|3.0132|1.3.2||
If the element is a player, this function will use the players voice.
}}
==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">float getSoundLength ( element theSound )</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/sound.md|sound]]:getLength|length}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theSound:''' the [[/sound.md|sound]] element which length you want to return.

===Returns===
Returns an [[/float.md|float]] value indicating the playback length of the [[/sound.md|sound]] element in seconds.

==Example== 
Plays a sound then outputs the sound length.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local sound = playSound("money.mp3",false) --Play a sound
local soundLength = getSoundLength(sound) --Get the length of the sound
outputChatBox("This sound is :" ..soundLength.. " long!")
</syntaxhighlight>
